channel.title: Comments on: Add Featured Post Widgets to Utility Pro
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Ginger Coolidge
item.dc:creator: Ginger Coolidge
item.description: I wrote this tutorial since I get asked a lot in Utility Pro support about how to work with the posts at the bottom of the Utility Pro demo home page. I meant to add it for this today's newsletter and forgot :-(
item.content:encoded: I wrote this tutorial since I get asked a lot in Utility Pro support about how to work with the posts at the bottom of the Utility Pro demo home page. I meant to add it for this today’s newsletter and forgot üôÅ
